title: Cinematic Piano - Volume 1
description: 10 cinematic modern piano themes with multiple loops and shorter edits
longDescription:
Also available "Cinematic Piano - Volume 2"


Preview the collection: Youtube


"Cinematic Piano - Volume 1" features 10 modern piano themes for your cinematic cuts and elegant visuals with multiple loops and shorter edits. The arrangements include acoustic pianos, high quality orchestral strings, ambient textures, drones and organic sounds.


  • Piano Cinematic Arpeggio: Full length (02:12), 2 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Piano Cold Soundscape: Full length (02:27), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Cinematic Piano Raindrops: Full length (00:41), 1 Short edit, 2 Loops
  • Passionate Piano Arpeggio: Full length (02:27), 1 Short edit, 4 Loops
  • Pensive Cinematic Piano: Full length (02:15), 3 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Piano Beautiful Memories: Full length (02:44), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Piano Cinematic Ambient: Full length (02:35), 2 Short edits, 3 Loops
  • Piano Cinematic Background: Full length (02:17), 1 Short edit, 4 Loops
  • Piano Romantic Memories: Full length (02:25), 2 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Valentine Piano: Full length (02:25), 2 Short edits, 7 Loops
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Full length tracks
  •  17 Short edits
  •  42 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 69

Number of Audio Cues: 69

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 100:25

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
